item.title: [Writeup] SWCTF 0x7e4
item.description:
First post of 2021!! Happy New Year~

This SWCTF was jointly designed by Feng Chia University Hacker Club, Providence University Xingyvnzhe R&D Base, and Taichung University of Science and Technology Computer Research Club.

item.title: [Writeup] AIS3 2020 Pre-exam
item.description: My first time participating in the 3-day AIS3 pre-exam, so excited! >< Though at my age I’m a bit late. Seeing so many high school students participating made me wonder what I was doing in high school lol I’m used to seeking guidance from @stavhaygn during CTFTime online competitions, but this individual competition is all on me QwQ

item.title: [Writeup] TJCTF 2020 - Weak Password (Blind SQL injection)
item.description:
Writeup from MacacaHub TJCTF 2020 Writeups

Although this challenge is called Weak Password, I really couldn’t crack it at the time ;w;

After the competition, a teammate pointed out that it was actually a Blind SQL injection. My usual ' or 1=1 -- poking was really just child’s play lol
